Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $15000 to you. I am proposing to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $13500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to the market value. Don't miss out on this opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at an attractive price. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $13,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $13,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
